tool_description: API for accessing live stock price updates from the Indian Stock Exchange (BSE/NSE). This API allows users to retrieve real-time stock prices by providing the stock symbol.

api_list.name: StockPrice
api_list.description: Fetches live price updates for a specified stock symbol from the Indian Stock Exchange.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The stock symbol for which the live price is requested.
